questions.question: What is Zaman?
questions.answer: Zaman is a faith-centered productivity platform that helps Muslims balance their dunya (worldly life) and akhirah (afterlife). It features a native Hijri calendar with prayer time integration, Islamic habit and deed tracking, Quran study tools, and Kenz AI - a personal knowledge assistant that helps organize thoughts, ideas, and content.

questions.question: Is Zaman just another prayer reminder app?
questions.answer: Although the core of Zaman is built around our prayer times library, Zaman is a productivity platform built from the perspective of a Muslim. It will eventually be a drop in replacement for your current productivity tools while keeping your faith at the center.

questions.question: When will Zaman be available?
questions.answer: We don't have a specific date yet; however,  our private beta program will be available soon. You can always register your interest by joining the Sabirin list. In the meantime know that we're working hard to bring you the best experience possible.

questions.question: What is the Sabirin list?
questions.answer: The Sabirin list is what is also known as a waitlist. by registering your interest you will be up to date with our launch programs and progress.

questions.question: How much will Zaman cost?
questions.answer: Zaman will be a freemium product. We will offer a free tier with limited features and a paid tier with more features.

questions.question: What platforms/devices will Zaman be available on?
questions.answer: Zaman will be available on all platforms/devices that support the web. We will also be available on iOS and Android.

questions.question: How can I contact you?
questions.answer: Write to us at salam{'@'}zaman.com - we genuinely value every message.

manifesto.title: The Zaman Way
manifesto.subtitle: The Path of Productive Faith
paragraphs: We treasure time, its passage and its power, In every fleeting minute, every hour. Our nourishment? The knowledge we procure, Belief, our pillar, steadfast and sure.
From failures, lessons learned, so we advance, In every detail, we give more than a glance. For the devil hides in the smallest piece, We seek excellence, not mere release.
Action defines us, louder than our speech, With great efforts, greater heights we reach. Unapologetic, steadfast in our quest, Through good and hard times, we strive to do our best.
Our vision extends beyond the here and now, Planting seeds for futures that our lives allow. To the roots of faith we anchor our cause, Live with purpose, governed by divine laws.
We prepare for a hereafter, bright and fair, With atomic steps and earnest care. Passionate to uplift, to heal, to mend, Providing solutions, on this we depend.
In uplifting the ummah, our spirits soar, Crafting counterpoints, opening new doors. With purpose, passion, belief, we're intertwined, In this manifesto, our aspirations you'll find.
